exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 2 patterns.

original: intro Hprime. destruct (Zp_invertible_prime x Hprime) as [Hx | Hx]. - left. apply Zp_invertible_eq_zero with y; auto. - right. rewrite <- (Zp_mult_comm x y), H in Hx. apply Zp_invertible_eq_zero with x; auto.
